intro: In the magical Prism Valley, a group of friends discover that the power of emotions can awaken the last dino-dragon and save their world.
description:
Immerse yourself in a colorful and magical visual novel for children, where emotions transform the world. Experience a charming adventure alongside Nika and her group of friends in a story full of friendship and fantasy.

Highlighted Features:

·Colorful visual novel designed especially for boys and girls.

·Fully dubbed with fun and relatable voices.

·Audiobook format ideal for listening and reading.

·Adorable and diverse characters, such as an artistic mini-mammoth

·Accessible, emotional, and positive story, perfect for family enjoyment.

·A magical dino-dragon

·Simple and friendly interface for little ones.
